img_above_text:
# Pungent Flesh Chunk
The Pungent Flesh Chunk is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge during Chapter 2. It is unmissable as it is dropped from the mandatory boss: King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair.

img_summary: The image depicts an inventory screen from a game, showcasing a key item called the "Pungent Flesh Chunk." This item is described as "flesh, torn from the foe, emits a pungent reek," and is noted for its potential to attract certain creatures called yaoguais. The Pungent Flesh Chunk is a mandatory collectible found in Chapter 2 of the game, specifically in Yellow Wind Ridge, after defeating the boss King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair. The item is categorized as legendary and is essential for progressing in the game.
